item.title: The `bmscstan` package is on CRAN!
item.description: Hi all! After a long journey, the bmscstan package is finally on CRAN, with a comprehensive vignette that shows how to use the package and how to check if everything is OK. The idea is to further extend its functions to non-gaussian dependent variables, however, this version is already ready to use. You can find its validation here. Dear all, I am very happy to announce that bmscstan, the R package for Bayesian Multilevel Single Case Models is on CRAN: https://t.

item.title: New R package on github! bmscstan: Bayesian Multilevel Single Case models
item.description:
The version 1.0.0 of the package bmscstan is ready to use!

Its purpose is to provide a general, simple interface to analyse single case studies with an lme4-like syntax.

You can find it on my github page, https://github.com/michelescandola/bmscstan, and you can install it by typing in the R console devtools::install_github(michelescandola/bmscstan).
